title.rendered: Embassy Visa Fees for Students Tourist and Visitors

content.rendered:
Embassy Visa Fees for Students Tourist and Visitors, Canada Visiting fees on How to apply for a visa, fees for Single Entry and Multiple Entry.

In this context, we will guide you on Embassy Visa Fees for Students Tourist and Visitors who are yet to go to Canada

Embassy visa Fees for Students tourists and Visitors.

Things to consider before getting for  visa

How much is the Canadian visa fee in Nigeria?

Embassy Visa fees

SINGLE ENTRY MULTIPLE ENTRY

Canada US$75 US$150
Cape Verde US$0 US$0
The central African Republic US$67 US$335

 

How much will it cost to travel from Nigeria to Canada?

  • The cost-effective way to get is by flight which costs $360-$750 and takes 25h 15m.

How long does it take to get a visa from Nigeria to Canada?

  • The average duration it takes for a super visa to be fully processed is 3 months and 17 days

How many hours does it take from Nigeria to Canada?

  • If you travel by airplane it takes 11.83 hours to arrive.

How much is a plane ticket from Lagos to Canada?

Flights to cities in Canada costs are as follows:

     Flights                                   Lowest Price

  • Lagos to Toronto                  NGN502, 330
  • Lagos to Calgary                   NGN491, 994
  • Lagos to Edmonton              NGN267, 694, 959
  • Lagos to Ottawa                  NGN593, 700

Please note the fees for the temporary Residents program and adult citizenship applications.

The fees are listed in Canadian dollars (CAN$)

              Permit /Visa                                                                                 Fee                             

Visitor Visa – single entry or multiple entries (including extensions)          $100

Visitor Visa – minimum fee for family                                                          $500

How long can you stay in Canada without a visa?

Most visitors can stay up to 6 months in Canada. if you’re allowed to get into Canada, the border service officer may allow you to stay for less or more than 6 months. They will put down the date you need to leave in your passport.

How much is the Canadian family visa fee?

Application                                                                                                            processing fee in $ CAD

  • Visitor visa for single or multiple entries to Canada for a family of 5 or                        –  $500
  • More (note that all family members must apply at once).                                            – $100 per person
  • Extend a visitor visa                                                                                                        – $100 per person
  • To Restore a visitor visa                                                                                                 –  $200 per person

Please note that you must observe the COVID-19: Safety measures.
